name: generic-action-buttons
title: Incident Action Buttons
shortDescription: Adds Escalate and Resolve buttons to incident lists using column formatting and executeFlow.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to embed action buttons into a SharePoint list column using column formatting.
The Escalate button is enabled only when Priority = high; the Resolve button is enabled when Status is not 'new'.
Each button is linked to a Power Automate flow via executeFlow.
